gui.oldfisherman.rod.oas: Wow! An antique fishing rod! These were made specially for catching unusual patterned Pokémon!
item.pixelmon.armorite_ore.tooltip: Can be crushed into various valuable resources.
item.pixelmon.dynite_ore.tooltip: Can be crushed into various valuable resources.
item.pixelmon.max_mushroom.tooltip: Used in preparing Max Soup. Pretty bitter, sweetening anything made with these will require something just as powerful.
item.pixelmon.max_honey.tooltip: Used in preparing Max Soup. Real Max Honey is acquired from a Dynamaxed Vespiquen...fortunately, this will do just fine as a replacement.
item.pixelmon.curry_gigantamix.tooltip: An extremely powerful blend of spices and other odd ingredients...is this safe to consume?
